name: BadChristmas
description:
You are  a small little boy Vanya, whose get coal as gift on Christmas.

And here Vanya's revenge.

Get a snowball fight with snowmans, elfs, and Santa

But don't forget, that it's cold tonight! Vanya can freeze, if he had too much snow. And he will be very unhappy, if he has to much coals. And if there is too much snow, Vanya can't walk fast, because he is little boy.

Elfs give you coals. Snowmans give you snowbals. You also can use shovel to get snowballs.

Santa is your main enemy.
